headlines.title: UN Mission Concludes RSF Siege of Sudan's El Fasher Bears Hallmarks of Genocide
headlines.summary: UN-mandated fact-finding mission reports RSF's 18-month siege and capture of North Darfur capital inflicted conditions to destroy Zaghawa and Fur ethnic groups. Affects displaced populations amid Sudan's civil war. Escalates calls for intervention in atrocities.

headlines.title: EU Chief Ursula von der Leyen Arrives in Kyiv to Mark Fourth Anniversary of Russian Invasion
headlines.summary: Von der Leyen visits war-torn Ukraine on February 24 anniversary of 2022 invasion, amid frontline stalemate and reconstruction needs. Tens of thousands dead, infrastructure devastated. Reinforces EU solidarity as Kyiv seeks sustained aid.

headlines.title: Rwanda-Backed Rebels Overrun Congolese Troops and Enter Goma Safe-Haven City
headlines.summary: Rebels trigger gunfire and shelling in Goma, overrunning troops; UN estimates over 1 million displaced now shelter there. Threatens key humanitarian aid hub in eastern Congo. Risks massive refugee crisis and regional instability.

headlines.title: 6.8-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Off Sabah Coast in Strongest Quake for Malaysia in 11 Years
headlines.summary: Quake hits early Monday off Sabah, surpassing 2015 Ranau 6.0 event that killed 18; tremors reach Singapore, no immediate deaths reported. Affects coastal communities and infrastructure. Prompts seismic monitoring and preparedness upgrades.

headlines.title: Renewed Fighting in South Sudan Displaces Nearly 280,000 Civilians UN Agency Warns
headlines.summary: Jonglei state clashes damage health facilities and fuel cholera spread, creating perfect storm with climate shocks. Nearly 280,000 affected needing urgent aid. Heightens famine risks in fragile nation.

headlines.title: Russian Soldiers Report Commanders Executing Troops for Refusing Ukraine Orders
headlines.summary: Four soldiers describe witnessing executions of comrades refusing frontline orders in Ukraine war. Exposes command brutality affecting Russian forces. Erodes troop morale in protracted invasion.

headlines.title: Rogue Kenyan Agencies Lure Over 1,000 Nationals to Fight for Russia in Ukraine
headlines.summary: Parliament hears intelligence on rogue recruiters sending Kenyans to Russian frontlines. Over 1,000 affected amid ongoing operations. Sparks calls for crackdown, reveals Africa's proxy role in war.

headlines.title: NASA and SpaceX Launch Crew-10 to International Space Station for Astronaut Retrieval
headlines.summary: Falcon 9 carries NASA, Japanese and Russian astronauts from Kennedy Space Center to relieve nine-month stranded Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams. Routine rotation resumes normal ISS operations. Strengthens space partnerships.

headlines.title: Russia Strikes Zaporizhzhia Infrastructure as Ukraine Marks Invasion Anniversary
headlines.summary: Strikes damage infrastructure in Zaporizhzhia on war's fourth anniversary. Officials report impacts on key facilities. Affects civilians and power supply, prolonging Ukraine's defense challenges.

headlines.title: Mexico Deploys Thousands of Soldiers to Quell Violence After Cartel Leader Killing
headlines.summary: Military sends thousands of troops nationwide after El Mencho's death in raid killing 62 sparks clashes; violence now ebbs with lockdowns. Affects residents and tourists amid cartel tensions. Prevents power vacuum escalations.
headlines.previousContext: Government deploys thousands of soldiers as nationwide violence subsides following initial raid aftermath

framings.angle: Emphasizes eruption of violence and deployment of thousands of soldiers to restore order
Highlights violence ebbing one day later with residents and tourists staying indoors

headlines.title: UK Releases Former US Ambassador Peter Mandelson After Epstein-Related Arrest
headlines.summary: Police release Mandelson on suspicion of misconduct in public office tied to Jeffrey Epstein dealings following Monday arrest. Affects elite networks under scrutiny. Investigation proceeds amid public outrage.
headlines.previousContext: Suspect released after initial arrest as probe into Epstein connections continues

headlines.title: Israel Allows Displaced Palestinians to Return to Northern Gaza After Hostage Breakthrough
headlines.summary: Military permits crossing of bisecting zone post-hostage release deadlock break; thousands stream back on foot. Eases plight of displaced Gazans. Signals potential de-escalation amid ceasefire talks.
headlines.previousContext: Returns accelerate following breakthrough in hostage negotiations lifting prior restrictions
